emailUpdate.submit.error.text: An unknown error occurred during the creation of a validation link. You may try again later.
emailUpdate.submit.error.title: Email update failed.
emailUpdate,success.main: A validation link was sent to {email}. You must click this link to activate your new email.
emailUpdate,success.sub: If you don't receive the email shortly, please check your spam folder. You can ask for a new link by reloading this page.
emailUpdate,success.title: Confirmation email sent
